price: ߤߍ߲߬ ߡߎߛߊ߫ ߟߋ߬߸ ߡߍ߲ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߒߠߋ ߟߋ߬ ߊߟߊ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߣߌ߬ߣߌ߬ߟߊ ߟߋ߬ ߸ ߥߘߋ߬ߥߘߋ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߊ ߟߋ߬
arabic: يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yāmūsā innahu anā al-lahu al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
